rules_text:
Whenever this becomes the target of a spell or ability, if its power is less than 4, put a +1/+1 counter on it. Then it phases out until end of turn. [i](Treat it and anything attached to it as though they don't exist until its controller's next turn.)[/i]
Whenever this creature deals combat damage to a player, remove all counters from it and draw that many cards.
